title: Part One: The Woman Who Invented Adoption (By Stealing Thousands of Babies)
itunes:title: Part One: The Woman Who Invented Adoption (By Stealing Thousands of Babies)
description:
In Episode 58, Robert is joined by Sofiya Alexandra to discuss George Tann, an abusive child molester who stole five thousand babies from poor parents to sell to the wealthy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
